text: Alicja Bachleda-Curuś (pron. ; born 12 May 1983) is a Polish actress and singer born in Tampico, Mexico. She is known for her roles in Trade, Ondine and Pan Tadeusz. Bachleda-Curuś has a son with Irish actor Colin Farrell. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Alicja in New York Times May 2007 * Alicja in GQ Magazine July 2007 * Interview with Alicja Bachleda Presented by Linda O'Brien Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican singers Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish stage actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Polish singers Category:Polish voice actors Category:Mexican voice actors
title: Alicja Bachleda-Curuś
